<h3 id="X21616">X(21616)&nbsp;=&nbsp;PERSPECTOR OF THESE TRIANGLES: WASAT AND 6th ANTI-MIXTILINEAR</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^3+(b-c)^2*a^2-(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<p class="bold">
    X(21616) = 3*X(2)+X(11415) = 3*X(10)-2*X(8256) = 3*X(1329)-X(8256) = X(1837)-3*X(17556) = 5*X(3616)-X(20076) = 3*X(3817)-2*X(7681) = 3*X(3892)-4*X(16215) = X(5730)+3*X(17556) = 3*X(5886)-X(10680) = 4*X(6691)-5*X(19862) = 5*X(8227)-X(12704)</p>

<p>
X(21616) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 3436}, {78, 1479}, {5687, 12701}, {10573, 11682}, {12116, 17857}<br>
X(21616) = reflection of X(56) in X(1125)<br>
X(21616) = complement of X(46)<br>
X(21616) = X(24)-of-Wasat triangle<br>
X(21616) = X(3436)-of-anti-Aquila triangle<br>
X(21616) = X(7517)-of-2nd Zaniah triangle<br>
X(21616) = X(10916)-of-2nd Johnson-Yff triangle<br>
X(21616) = X(21077)-of-outer-Yff triangle<br>
X(21616) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 908, 21077), (2, 11415, 46), (2, 12047, 12609), (4, 997, 17647), (5, 960, 10), (8, 5187, 10826), (10, 11813, 946), (946, 3452, 10), (960, 5087, 5), (2886, 5044, 10), (3814, 3878, 10), (3820, 5836, 10), (5044, 9955, 2886), (5123, 5690, 10), (5837, 10175, 10)<br>
</p>
